article: There is a big  _  in our city. We can see many  _  there. A(n)  _  the biggest animal on land is also  living  there. Many birds fly in the sky .Some beautiful ducks always  _  in the river. What are these in the trees? Oh, they are  _  .They like  eating  leaves. They are from Australia. Aren't they cute? There's a tiger in the cage under the tree. It eats  a lot of  meat every day. I like the  _  best because it only lives in China and it's the symbol of  _  .
